forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
